name: AxyCoin
description: AXYC is a next-gen ecosystem merging AI, GameFi, and Web3. It offers a unique digital experience through intelligent virtual companions, tokenized services, and gamified learning — all within a transparent, regulated framework. As a limited-supply utility token, AXYC powers access to virtual pets, NFT assets, and educational modules. More than just a token, it’s your gateway to the future of play, learning, and digital value.
